long_description: . Authors: Colorado Mountain Club Foundation. Softcover; 208 pages; color photographs and topographical maps. Colorado Mountain Club Press; copyright 2010. Organized by mountain range, this pack guide is written in clear, nontechnical language. Features concise directions for driving to the trailhead and locating parking; includes route-difficulty ratings. Tells estimated distance for the routes and the time needed to do the route, followed by a trail description. Sidebars are included on various Fourteener topics. Fourteeners climbing tick list.
short_description: The Colorado's 14ers: The Standard Routes features the most popular routes for all 54 of Colorado's Fourteeners.
